properties.address: Alverdiscott Methodist Chapel, Barnstaple, Devon EX31 3PT
properties.title: Alverdiscott Methodist Chapel

properties.description: Public library open to all with access to books, free Wi-Fi, computers and a warm welcome. Special activities and events as advertised. Chatty Cafe is on during extra winter opening hours monthly Wednesdays 12 - 13.30 for free refreshments including soup and a roll. 18th December, 22nd January 2025, 26th February 2025, 26th March 2025. This takes place upstairs in the library - no lift available but refreshments can be taken in the library itself.
properties.title: Appledore Library

properties.description: Barnstaple Library is open six days a week and is fully accessible. Aside from a wide range of fiction and non-fiction books, we offer free Wi-Fi, public access computers, printing, newspapers and a varied programme of events. From October to March people can help themselves to a warm coat from our rail. Wellbeing Cafe every Wednesday 10-12 in the library foyer, serving free tea, coffee and biscuits. From November to end of February 2026 free soup and bread served Wednesdays in the foyer from 12pm, whilst stocks last. Everyone welcome. There are plenty of comfortable, cosy corners for sitting, reading or studying along with charging points. For more information about resources at the library follow this link: https://discover.librariesunlimited.org.uk/-/barnstaple-library#/
properties.title: Barnstaple Library

properties.address: Bideford Library and Learn Devon, Bideford, Devon EX39 2EY
properties.description: Souper Tuesday offers a warm welcome and free soup to all from 12.00pm - 1.30pm every Tuesday until the end of March 2024. Friendly chats and service with a smile all part of the offer. Located in the Juniper Room on the first floor.
properties.title: Bideford Library

properties.address: Bideford Library and Learn Devon, Bideford, Devon EX39 2EY
properties.description: Chatty Cafe every Thursday from 12 - 1.30pm in the Juniper room (first floor of the library building). Free refreshments and soup. A chance to meet new people and learn about what is happening locally.
properties.title: Bideford Library
Braunton Foodbank and Cafe at South Street Church

properties.description: Hall open to all for Monthly coffee mornings when free hot drinks and biscuits are provided on 1st Saturday of the month.

properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.address: Devon Antenatal Family Centre, Barnstaple, Devon EX31 1BA
properties.description: Purpose built play cafe for under 5's. 'New to You' shop with integrated Baby Bank and antenatal, postnatal and parenting courses.
properties.title: Devon Antenatal Family Centre

properties.description: Free drop-in on Monday mornings, all parents and caregivers welcome with their babies/children. Accessible and ground floor space with peer support available, tea/coffee and refreshments.
properties.title: Early Nourishment Barnstaple

properties.address: St Mary's Church, Bideford, Devon EX39 2BP
properties.description: Free Meal every Friday from 11.15am, including Tea & Coffee, Soup, Hot Home-Cooked Main Course (inc. Vegetarian Option) and Pudding - All Welcome. We can also provide a small supply of tinned goods for anyone experiencing a crisis situation and signpost people to other local services where necessary.
properties.title: Friday Diner at St Mary's Church

properties.address: Lavington United Reformed Church, Devon EX39 2QE
properties.description: A cafe for the community, run by volunteers from the local church, providing hot and cold meals and hot drinks. Open every Tuesday from 10:00am until 1:00pm.
properties.title: Lavington's Tuesday Cafe

properties.address: Swimbridge Jubilee Hall, Barnstaple, Devon EX32 0PQ
properties.description: We hold a coffee morning every Tuesday from 10 -12 in the Jubilee Hall (with the exception of the 3rd Tuesday in the month - see * below). Everyone is welcome. Refreshments cost .50p but this can be waived. Sometimes we also offer free craft sessions. We have level access, disabled parking and disabled toilets. *Note on the 3rd Tuesday the coffee morning is held in the upper old school room behind the Church. It has has steep stone steps and no disabled facilities and there is a small charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Swimbridge Jubilee Hall
